name: Christian Deger
body:
![Christian Deger](/images/cd.jpg)

### Social Links
* LinkedIn <https://www.linkedin.com/in/christiandeger1>
* Xing <https://www.xing.com/profile/Christian_Deger2>
* Twitter <https://twitter.com/cdeger>
* about.me: <https://about.me/christian.deger>

### Microservices Meetup Munich
* Meetup page <http://www.meetup.com/Microservices-Meetup-Munich/>
* YouTube Channel <https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeh0x77J4sv2E1IFMzAEiBw>

### Public talks with recordings
* Microservices Meetup Munich <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wf91ML8ltGw>
* ThoughtWorks XConf <https://www.thoughtworks.com/talks/highway-to-heaven-building-microservices-in-the-cloud>
* Voxxed Days Belgrade (01.10.2015) <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pujL7EY7Zno>
* Microservices Meetup Dublin <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=usCTvxDkt3U>
* GOTO Night Berlin <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xM8CBgqCEBY>
* Microservices Day London <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IxKisTcWKR0>

### Books contributed to
* Microservice Architecture: Aligning Principles, Practices, and Culture - O’Reilly <http://transform.ca.com/API-microservice-architecture-oreilly-book.html>

### Articles
* JavaSpektrum - Preisbewertungstool <http://www.sigs-datacom.de/fachzeitschriften/javaspektrum/archiv/artikelansicht/artikel-titel/data-science-produktiv-ein-neues-datengetriebenes-preisbewertungstool.html>
* InfoQ - AutoScout24’s Journey to Microservices: Christian Deger on Transformation, Principles and Technology <https://www.infoq.com/news/2016/02/autoscout-microservices>
* JAXenter - "Beim Übergang zu Microservices geht es nicht nur um einen Technologiewechsel" - Interview mit Christian Deger <https://jaxenter.de/beim-uebergang-zu-microservices-geht-es-nicht-nur-um-einen-technologiewechsel-34188>
* DZone (mentioned) - Staging Servers Are Dead! <https://dzone.com/articles/staging-servers-are-dead>
